p: In the United States, a mortality rate of 45% was reported in free-living raccoons ( Procyon lotor) found within, around, and outside a zoo in 2001 [ 37]. CDV has also been stated as one of the most important causes of mortality in the gray fox ( Urocyon cinereoargenteus) [ 38]. Likewise, a CDV outbreak almost led to the extinction of the black-footed ferret ( Mustela nigripes) [ 39].
